name: Movie Watching Simulator
description:
Welcome to Movie Watching Simulator

This game used to feature one of the movies made in 2022 but I removed it because copyright

In this game you must watch "generic unlicensed movie", try and save up money to buy a ticket whilst trying not to starve and dehydrate

Also this has like the source code included with it for free (:

Features

"Expansive" World

Multiple endings!

Open source

Extremely poor programming choices

*To Play*

Options with ** around them are key words, type them in for stuff to happen, it's case sensitive so when typing make sure to match the caps and non-caps

Explore around and try to save up enough money to buy a ticket
